title: report option in champ select phase
body:
Riot, can you please implement a report option in champ select phase?
Here's what I have experienced in many of my games:
I was playing with Player A in last game, and he tilted so hard (we won eventually as I muted him and I told everyone else to mute him), then I had A for my next game, and this is what happens in champ select phase:
A said: f**k you, I'm gonna ban your champ and troll you, I don't really care as I'm auto-filled....
srsly, I've seen so many of those examples where players troll their team in champ select phase and force one of his teammates to dodge! 
And we don't even have a way to report those players!

replies.body: I'm fairly sure this has been discussed multiple times over the years and personally I don't see how this will solve anything. You're either going to report them and play a shit game because you're tilted already, or report them and dodge. If you're really fixed on reporting somebody do it at the end of the game

see a really big problem is thatmost of the reason id say 90% someone dodges is because they think another player is going to be a problem and cause a loss which particularly can be a problem if you have a good game because then you spend 70 minutes in a lost cause which is absolutely the worst
guys riot don't give a fuck about these,  only thing they care about is selling their SKINS
This is actually such a good idea :o
